name: Shooter VR Mobile
description:
This is a game done at Unity Roadshow VR (2016, in São Paulo, Brazil).

Shoot the robots before they destroy you!

  • You need VR glass for smartphone with some way to click the screen!
  • Click to shoot in the robots
  • Use your head to control the camera
  • You have 3 lifes before the screen become completely red
  • The game restart automatically, just wait a little to try again
